sub_title: Chief Risk Officer - Ex-Revolut | Ex-Square | Ex-Amex
summary: Risk Management / Fraud Management / Business Management / Business Strategy / Business Consultation / Business Development / Business Analysis / Six Sigma / Lean Management / SEO and SEM / E-Commerce / Online Marketing / Marketing / SME for all consumer risk-related matters in EMEA and JAPA.

profile_positions.description:
Ownership of the risk framework including policy and procedure development for a global acquiring product launch and additional business products.

Launched the Revolut Pay payments scheme to scaled clients to accept 25m Revolut retail users via seamless credit transfer instead of card payments. Created compliant buyer protection and seller protection policies for a global audience.

Established RevolutPro and successfully rolled out a business grade product for freelancers from ideation to execution. Ownership from internal testing all the way to public launch.

Building all key functions including credit, fraud and regulatory and scheme compliance and a full operational risk service team to support all these disciplines. 

Building the entire risk data science and engineering function to support all risk product development (internal and external facing).

Working closely with vendors, payments networks and regulators to ensure a successful delivery of an acquiring product to market with a fully functioning risk organisation.

Providing extensive consultation to the wider organisation and product owners on all things to execute a successful launch and iterations of the product.

Strategically supporting business planning and horizon scanning to ensure competitive product delivery.
profile_positions.title: Head of Acquiring Risk

profile_positions.description:
Managing all aspects of Risk Operations for Square in Australia, Canada, Japan and the UK.
Managing all relationships with internal and external stakeholders including  networks, acquirers across EMEA and APAC.  
Support changes and new risk introductions into international market and ensuring products and changes are launched in new markets within risk appetite and building all risk frameworks to execute safely on deployment including the monitoring of performance.
Investigate all losses to Square and implement methods of reducing and eliminating risk loss to Square via machine learned models, heuristics or analyst education.
Regularly and adhoc updating of board, country leadership and risk leadership on risk landscape and performance in international markets.
Working closely with data science and risk engineering to maintain risk models and heuristics within performance levels of desired risk appetite and tuning levers to take more or less risk as needed.
Managing risk analyst teams in various global locations to ensure that risk loss is maintain within goals and that teams develop according to the current and desired future state.
profile_positions.title: Risk Lead | International Markets

profile_positions.description:
Partnering with wholesale and retail customers over the lifecycle of the financial products (which included non-cash payment products amongst others), including ordering the product, delivery of the product, and purchasing and encashment of the product. 
Managing day to day operations in respect of the Amex financial product offering (including non-cash payment products) across EMEA and JAPA risk operations. 
Overseeing all aspects of fraud and risk operations with primary goal to ensure minimal financial and reputational loss to American Express. 
Liaising with clients to provide advice on operation of the non-cash payment products, fraud prevention techniques, product related fraud and loss prevention training and advice. 
Telephone discussions with retail customers and wholesale customers on a daily basis. This included approvals for any encashments of over $50,000 with our wholesale customers and dealing with all retail customer escalations within my jurisdiction. 
Working in a team to oversee the compliance aspects of the preparation of marketing materials (eg to make sure that the general advice statements did not encroach into personal advice). 
Ensuring all statement of an advisory nature in print material is compliant with financial services laws and in line with risk policy. 
Advising clients on selecting suitable non-cash payment products in respect of American Express Prepaid Servicesâ€™ deposit products including Amex Prepaid Travel Card and Travellers Cheques
Approving, with assistance from legal, customer facing content, including letters, emails and faxes to ensure adherence to financial services regulatory laws (in particular in respect of general advice), brand standard and compliance with risk framework.
profile_positions.title: Team Leader, Global Prepaid Consumer Risk Operation JAPA

profile_positions.description:
As a risk analyst at American Express I was responsible for dealing directly with wholesale and retail clients around the globe who utilised financial, travel and related insurance products. The extent of the role expanded into the investigation of the legitimacy of transactions and claims under the insurance provided with the said products.
Working closely with investigations teams, law enforcements and general counsel to finalise and provide timely resolutions to our stakeholders. 
Working closely with wholesalers around the globe to provide authorisation where the automated process determined the transactions to be suspicious based on a series of heuristics and  
Filing Suspicious Matter Reports (SMR) on accounts where we determined potential for fraud or criminal behaviour to AUSTRAC.
profile_positions.title: Risk Analyst, Global Prepaid Consumer Risk Operations EMEA and India

profile_positions.description: Transformation of the ANZ Indonesia business and strategic alliance with Panin Bank.
profile_positions.title: FX Analyst and Project Lead Assistant
